// Serve on https with autocert
mux := http.NewServeMux()
mux.Handle("/", http.FileServer(http.Dir(*staticDir)))
mux.Handle("/install.sh", http.RedirectHandler(installer, http.StatusPermanentRedirect))

m := &autocert.Manager{
	Cache:      autocert.DirCache(*cacheDir),
	Prompt:     autocert.AcceptTOS,
	HostPolicy: autocert.HostWhitelist("mfeller.io", "www.mfeller.io"),
}
go http.ListenAndServe(":http", m.HTTPHandler(nil))
s := &http.Server{
	Addr:      ":https",
	TLSConfig: m.TLSConfig(),
	Handler:   mux,
}
s.ListenAndServeTLS("", "")

(defun helm-version (&optional args)
  (interactive (list (transient-args 'helm-version-popup)))
  (let ((buffer-name (format "*Helm Version*")))
    (if (member "--short" args)
        (message (helm--exec-string (append '("version") args)))
      (helm--exec buffer-name nil (append '("version") args)))))
